### findNearestCommonDominator() {#a5d9f37d3681f5f14f5cf21fdf060703f}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>MachineBasicBlock &#42; MachinePostDominatorTree::findNearestCommonDominator (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/arrayref">ArrayRef</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &#42; &gt; Blocks) const</>}>
Returns the nearest common dominator of the given blocks.

If that tree node is a virtual root, a nullptr will be returned.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinepostdominators-h/#l00064">64</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/codegen/machinepostdominators-h">MachinePostDominators.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinepostdominators-cpp/#l00095">95</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/machinepostdominators-cpp">MachinePostDominators.cpp</a>.
